name: One Simple API
natural_language_description: 这是 One Simple API 节点。主要用于: A toolbox of no-code utilities

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: website | (必填项)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: validateEmail
available_options: Expand URL (值: expandURL) - Expand a shortened URL
Generate QR Code (值: qrCode) - Generate a QR Code
Validate Email (值: validateEmail) - Validate an email address

link.name: link
link.natural_language_description: 参数名: URL | 作用: URL to unshorten | (必填项)

download.name: download
download.description: Whether to download the screenshot or return a link to it
download.natural_language_description: 参数名: Download Screenshot? | 作用: Whether to download the screenshot or return a link to it | 默认值: False | (必填项)

output.name: output
output.description: The name of the output field to put the binary file data in
output.natural_language_description: 参数名: Put Output In Field | 作用: The name of the output field to put the binary file data in | 默认值: data | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}

message.name: message
message.description: The text that should be turned into a QR code - like a website URL
message.natural_language_description: 参数名: QR Content | 作用: The text that should be turned into a QR code - like a website URL | (必填项)

profileName.name: profileName
profileName.description: Profile name to get details of
profileName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Profile Name | 作用: Profile name to get details of | (必填项)

artistName.name: artistName
artistName.description: Artist name to get details for
artistName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Artist Name | 作用: Artist name to get details for | (必填项)

value.name: value
value.natural_language_description: 参数名: Value | 作用: Value to convert | (必填项)

fromCurrency.name: fromCurrency
fromCurrency.natural_language_description: 参数名: From Currency | (必填项)

toCurrency.name: toCurrency
toCurrency.natural_language_description: 参数名: To Currency | (必填项)

emailAddress.name: emailAddress
emailAddress.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email Address | (必填项)
